Roots.help: Immobilizes a group of foes by entangling their feet in a twisted mass of thorny Roots. Roots is slower and does less damage than Entangle, but it can capture many multiple foes in one attack.
Roots.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Lethal), Foe Immobilize
Roots.targetHelp: The Roots have entangled you. You are immobile and cannot fly.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Spore_Burst.help: You hurl a large fungi pod at your foes. This pod is full of Spores that burst on impact, engulfing the target and all those around him. All affected targets may succumb to the narcotic effect of the Spores and will fall asleep. The targets will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked.
Spore_Burst.targetHelp: The Spore Burst has rendered you unconscious! Any damage will awaken you, however.

Vines.help: Creates a field of Strangler Vines that can Hold multiple foes are range. The affected targets are held helpless by the massive root-like vines.
Vines.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DoT(Smashing), Foe Hold
Vines.targetHelp: The Vines are Holding you and preventing you from acting.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage over time.

Thorny_Darts.help: Hurls small Thorny Darts at your foes. Thorny Darts deal moderate damage. Poison from the Darts deals additional Toxic damage and can reduce your foes Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Thorny_Darts.targetHelp: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.

Fling_Thorns.help: You can throw dozens of Thorns in a wide cone in front of you, impaling foes caught within the area. These Thorns deals moderate damage, and poisons any targets it hits. Thorn poison deals additional Toxic damage and can reduce your foes Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Fling_Thorns.targetHelp: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.

Impale.help: You can throw a small cluster of large Thorns at a targeted foe. This Thorn carries a large amount of the toxin. In addition to dealing Toxic damage, a successful attack can slow a target, preventing them from Running, Jumping of Flying. Most foes will likely be completely Immobilize, unable to run. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Impale.targetHelp: You are poisoned! Your Running speed is reduced and you may be immobilized and unable to run, jump or fly.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.

Thorn_Barrage.help: A short range, but devastating attack. Thorn Barrage unleashes your Thorns at high velocity causing severe damage at close range. Although these Thorns only travel a short distance, their impact can knock most foes on their back. Thorn poison deals additional Toxic damage and can reduce your foes Defense. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Thorn_Barrage.targetHelp: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!
